question: The members of the Constituent Assembly which drafted the Constitution of India were?
option3: elected by the Legislative Assemblies of various provinces
option4: elected by the Indian National Congress and Muslim League
answer: elected by the Legislative Assemblies of various provinces
explanation: The Constitution of India was drafted by the Constituent Assembly, and it was implemented under the Cabinet Mission Plan on 16 May 1946. The members of the Constituent Assembly were elected by the provincial assemblies by a single, transferable-vote system of proportional representation.
